name: seven years of development hell.
description:
a host of game ideas in various states of development made since my senior year in high school. some good ideas, some awful ones, and a whole lot of mess. included are as follows:

+GOREHOUNDS:
a hyperviolence shooter about making walking corpses explode and setting trees on fire.
music by THE VIDEOGAME ORCHESTRA, RUSHJET1, and NINE INCH NAILS.
(this game is licensed by creative commons share-alike).

+SANCTUARY:
a game about floating around as a little robot and finding stereos, friends and vehicles.

+CANDLELIGHT:
a game about lines and growing seeds.
music by Chopin.

+ONCE UPON A TIME:
a game about inspiration, society and divergent paths. please don't play this.
uses various C64 era music.

ALSO INCLUDED ARE THESE PROTOTYPES:

+NIGHTHOUNDS:
a remade version of GOREHOUNDS. shoot things and suck up their blood to build momentum.

+ZOMBIE PROTOTYPE 6
an even earlier version of GOREHOUNDS with invisible, useless bullets, slow movement and slowly closing zombies.

+WINTER:
two player MISSILE COMMAND. NOBODY WINS.

+PONGOUT:
like PONG and BREAKOUT but with terrible controls and physics. (also two player)

+NAME GENERATOR:
it puts names together to create random names. (these names are very white and male)
